A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They should've just gathered all of the fan theories and speculations\, and that would've had a much better plot and consistency. Honestly\, I wanted to love this movie so much\, but after seeing it\, I left feeling so disappointed and kind of hurt. They let all the Star Wars fans down! There were so many ways you could've gone that would've been 100% better than the path you took. Bad storytelling all around.
